content.content: ![image](https://assets.leetcode.com/users/images/da08f115-faed-418b-96c6-deda454291c8_1628133536.974618.jpeg)\nWhy the expected answer show Yaffah 4 times? It should be  most recent 3 orders of each user.  Do anyone know what is wrong here and why my solution is incorrect?
Should be partition by Customer_id, instead of name here.
